biotools.summary: Bivartect is a simple yet versatile variant caller based on direct comparison of short sequence reads between normal and mutated samples. Bivartect can detect not only single nucleotide variants but also insertions/deletions, inversions and their complexes.

bioschemas.name: Bivartect
